message:
Apple, Google, Microsoft: Where does the money come from?
Wow, Apple makes 55% of its revenue from iPhone but only 13% from Mac.
Also, at WWDC Tim Cook said that Mac has an install base on 80 million users. This is the same size as Windows 8/8.1 install base. In other words, nothing.
To put it another way, all the Apple laptops you see at trendy coffee shops and those in Movies and TV shows are all the Apple laptops there is, it's not the tip of any iceberg :D
http://www.zdnet.com/apple-google-microsoft-where-does-the-money-come-from-7000026043/
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message:
زى بالظبط 
ليه الناس بتاكل فول وطعميه أكتر من اللحمة الجملى :D

It is a known fact that the vast majority of iPhone and iPad users are Windows users. 
800 million iOS device sold 
80 million Macs sold
ipod is 2% of their total sales. why they just don't kill it?!
Because 2% is still a shit load of money :)
if (the revenue > operation cost) {you are totally right}
iPod touch is also a sort of gateway drug for young kids who are not yet getting a full blown iPhone but still want to play iOS games and apps.
